#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int n,a[1000],l,i;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n!=-1)
    {
        l=0;
        while(n>=7)
        {
            a[l++]=n%7;
            n/=7;
        }
        a[l]=n;
        for(i=l;i>=0;i--) printf("%d",a[i]);
        printf(" ");
        scanf("%d",&n);
    }
    return 0;
}
